channel.title: Two Questions
channel.description:
[B][I][U]Question 1:[/U][/I][/B]
[font=Century Gothic]I am using Shard Revolution as a base, and I need to edit/fix the saving so I can [U]edit[/U] player stats and inventory. Currently the server saves the file in a [B].dat[/B] format, therefore its uneditable by me. I have tried to open it with WordPad and NotePad, but this is what I get:[/font]
[font=Century Gothic]Wordpad:[/font] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28mmhlc.jpg[/img] [font=Century Gothic]Notepad:[/font] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mrd655.jpg[/img]
[font=Century Gothic](Note I have tried changing:[/font] [CODE] String file = "./savedGames/" + tempSave.playerName + ".dat";[/CODE] [font=Arial Black]TO[/font] [CODE] String file = "./savedGames/" + tempSave.playerName + ".txt";[/CODE] [font=Century Gothic]in Playermanager.java, but it gives me the same problem I have with notepad above.)[/font]
[hr] [hr] [hr]
[B][I][U]Question 2:[/U][/I][/B]
[font=Century Gothic]Shard Revolution has a great system for dialouges, you can find a:[/font]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/25rmlia.jpg[/img]
[font=Century Gothic]In that folder is a:[/font] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28v8t5k.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic]It looks a little like this:[/FONT] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/1zz16pv.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic]The actions that it allows are:[/FONT] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/29ux9nm.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic]I am quite sure actions are edited here:[/FONT] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2jfdra1.jpg[/img]
[FONT=Century Gothic]So... I would like to create an action TELE_TO <XCORD> <YCORD>, how would I do something like this?[/FONT]

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Great question I’m not personally sure, and I’m not lookin to be on this computer much longer, so just be “experienced” and read up

Read full topic

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Yes, the cfg reads from a dialouge.java or dialougehandler.java (can’t remember :P), but I am wondering how I would declare the TELE_TO in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I don’t have experience with .cfg’s, but first off, I’m sure the .cfg’s have their own uniform way of working, correct? I don’t think you’d be able to just randomly add a tele_to unless the .cfg’s read for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Please, you have no idea about whats happening. I am telling the dialouge.cfg to do something when clicked. I already have BANK, CLOSE, NEXT , and SHOP

I just need a TELE_TO command, that works in the dialouge. Please I would like some more “experienced” help.

Read full topic

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

your second question why would u look in dialogues to make a command? also check tuts

Read full topic

item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Question 1:

[font=Century Gothic]I am using Shard Revolution as a base, and I need to edit/fix the saving so I can edit player stats and inventory. Currently the server saves the file in a .dat format, therefore its uneditable by me. I have tried to open it with WordPad and NotePad, but this is what I get:[/font]

[font=Century Gothic]Wordpad:[/font]

28mmhlc.jpg765×528

[font=Century Gothic]Notepad:[/font]
2mrd655.jpg954×167

[font=Century Gothic](Note I have tried changing:[/font]

		String file = "./savedGames/" + tempSave.playerName + ".dat";

[font=Arial Black]TO[/font]

		String file = "./savedGames/" + tempSave.playerName + ".txt";

[font=Century Gothic]in Playermanager.java, but it gives me the same problem I have with notepad above.)[/font]

[hr]
[hr]
[hr]

Question 2:

[font=Century Gothic]Shard Revolution has a great system for dialouges, you can find a:[/font]

[font=Century Gothic]In that folder is a:[/font]

[FONT=Century Gothic]It looks a little like this:[/FONT]

1zz16pv.jpg1024×715

[FONT=Century Gothic]The actions that it allows are:[/FONT]

29ux9nm.jpg946×251

[FONT=Century Gothic]I am quite sure actions are edited here:[/FONT]

[FONT=Century Gothic]So… I would like to create an action TELE_TO , how would I do something like this?[/FONT]
